item.title: Rich Content
Credit Scoring Model
item.description: In base of the work of Naeem Siddiqi, the author of “Credit Risk Scorecards Developing and Implementing Intelligent Credit Scoring”, we are going to propose a credit scoring model for credit cards in base of the data from the bank Interbank. The purpose of the model is to find a credit profile for each customer in order to predict the default risk od the portalio. This model is going to be elaborate using python.

item.title: Credit Scoring Model
item.description: In base of the work of Naeem Siddiqi, the author of “Credit Risk Scorecards Developing and Implementing Intelligent Credit Scoring”, we are going to propose a credit scoring model for credit cards in base of the data from the bank Interbank. The purpose of the model is to find a credit profile for each customer in order to predict the default risk od the portalio. This model is going to be elaborate using python.
